name: Radio Activity (ArthropodCollective)
description:
# GAME DESCRIPTION

Title: RadioActivity
Authors: Arthropod Collective
Genre: 2D platformer

You are Jason, the janitor at the Radio Station, and you've been that for a long, long time. 
The world has changed around you, though. But have the people? 
Who will you become when you reach the top of the tower?

# CREDITS

RadioActivity
A Game by Arthropod Collective

Tick the Arthropod - code, art & animation, design
Moth the Arthropod - design, sound, art

Introducing:
Ludwig van Beethoven - music (performed by Skidmore College Orchestra)

# CONTROL SCHEME

Walk - left-right arrows
Climb - up-down arrows
Jump - X
Attack - Z
Use - up arrow
